strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.description: A man who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge was the prince of Eblan, a nation rich in the ancient tradition of ninja; an art that Edge himself used in battle. He was rude, hotheaded, and stubborn, and his subordinates often bore the brunt of his rashness. However, his straightforward personality and strong will were admired by many, who adoringly called him "Young Highness."
strings.fusion:
Well, this feels rather strange.
Did it make me stronger?
strings.summon:
I am Edge, prince of Eblan!
I will teach you the ways of the ninja!

strings.evolution:
I cannot lie to my own heart!
I will embrace my anger and hatred...and they'll rocket me to the top!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge's home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, which prompted him to infiltrate the enemy's stronghold, seeking revenge for the fate of his lost countrymen. Once inside the Tower of Babil, he underwent many terrible trials, including doing battle against his own grotesquely transformed parents. However, he successfully defeated Rubicante, and later continued helping Cecil and his other comrades in their quest to stop Golbez from realizing his ambitions.
strings.fusion: I will use this power to protect my country, my comrades, and her!
strings.summon:
Excuse me, have you seen a beautiful green-haired girl around here?
Her name is Rydia.
Do you happen to know her?

strings.evolution: Father, Mother...please watch over me. I will become much stronger, you'll see!
strings.affinity: People could grow stronger if they chose to fight together. I truly believe that!
strings.description: The prince of Eblan, who appears in the tales of a blue planet watched over by two moons. Edge had mastered the ninja techniques inherited from his ancestors. His home was destroyed by Rubicante, one of Golbez's Archfiends, and thus he sought vengeance by following him, alone, to the Tower of Babil. There he met Cecil, whom at first he refused to join, as he was still obsessed with revenge. However, the obstinacy he showed in the beginning began to wane as he traveled with Cecil, gradually giving way to a more mature and sensitive personality.
strings.fusion: Have I become even lighter on my feet? Very well, now leave the rest to me!
strings.summon:
My apologies for the wait!
I will punish all evildoers who cross our path!
